resources.string: Delete all the Channels stored in database, eventually they will be added during playlist\'s synchronization. All the additional values, like favorite and failures for media urls, will be erased. Also all the Groups will be erased.
Do you really want to delete all the channels?

This will delete all the Channels stored in database, eventually they will be added during playlist\'s synchronization. All the additional values, like favorite and failures for media urls, will be erased. Also all the Groups will be erased.
Delete all the Tv Guides stored in database, eventually they will be added during EPG\'s synchronization.
Do you really want to delete all the Tv Guides?
This will delete all the Tv Guides stored in database, eventually they will be added during playlist\'s synchronization.
